alert.note: Alert for Fayette; Union; Wayne (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 25 at 8:31PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF WAYNE, UNION AND EAST CENTRAL FAYETTE COUNTIES IN EAST CENTRAL INDIANA, WEST CENTRAL SHELBY, PREBLE, DARKE, NORTHWESTERN MONTGOMERY AND NORTHWESTERN MIAMI COUNTIES IN WEST CENTRAL OHIO THROUGH 915 PM EDT... At 831 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was located near Liberty, moving north at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph, pea size hail, frequent cloud-to-ground lightning, and very heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Hail may cause minor damage to outdoor objects. Lightning can cause serious injury or death. Visibility will be poor and hydroplaning is possible. Locations impacted include... Richmond, Greenville, Eaton, Centerville, Versailles, Liberty, Arcanum, Camden, Bradford, Lewisburg, Union City, New Paris, West Alexandria, Ansonia, New Madison, Fountain City, West College Corner, Salem, Webster and Abington. This includes the following Interstates... I-70 in Indiana between mile markers 141 and 156. I-70 in Ohio between mile markers 0 and 19. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. Motorists should slow down and use extra caution. When thunder roars, go indoors! Do not stay in the open or seek shelter under trees when lightning threatens. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
